alert.note: Alert for Western Kenai Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 9:17PM AKST until February 18 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM AKST FRIDAY FROM NINILCHIK NORTH... * WHAT...Freezing Rain. Ice accumulation up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Along the Sterling Highway from Ninilchik to Kenai and Soldotna. * WHEN...Until 5 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect areas of freezing rain along the Sterling Highway through the overnight hours as temperatures from Soldotna south to Ninilchik remain around freezing. The wintry mix of precipitation is expected to taper off early Friday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
